a NFT collection to write a unique crypto story

Get some of the 10k unique Otter Club NFTs and enjoy exclusive benefits lite a 1.5 million $OTTR coin package for each NFT you own, the chance to unlock the hidden whale wallet and NFT holder only access to the Otter Launchpad, a exclusive member area to get introduced to new high potential and audited crypto projects. 

Sign up for the Whitelist
Otter Club

OTTRC #2575

The Otter Club NFT Collection contains 10,000 randomly generated OTTER NFTS showing Weeping Pleb in different variations based on 50 different traits where some are rarer than others.

Join the Community

The Otter Club NFT Collection was created to to build the important fundamentals to realize the future vision of whole ecosystem. 

Each Otter Club NFT is unique and programmatically generated from Ollie as the base characters and was paired with up to 50 possible traits, including headwear, clothing, expression and more. 

All Otter Club NFTs are amazing, but some are rarer than others. Each Otter Club NFT, not matter how rare it is, comes with a $OTTR token package of 1.5 million tokens, that will send through an airdrop to all NFT holders at the token launch day. 

In addition to that each Otter Club NFT doubles as a exclusive membership access token to the “Otter Club House”, a members only audited area to discover new crypto and NFT projects and to pitch a own project for an audit. 

Purchasing a Otter Club NFT costs 0.02 ETH on public mint and 0.016 ETH for everyone that are on the whitelist. 

10k

unique NFTs

100x

Value per NFTS

/ Holder Utility

what you can do with the otter club nft?

The Otter Club NFT is the fundamental for the entire OTTERLY project and let you enjoy exclusive benefits through the roadmap. Like amazing giveaways at each chapter of Ollie’s Diary, a highly profitable $OTTR token package and the chance to unlock the hidden whale wallet. 

More about the Roadmap
Collectible

Your Otter Club NFT is a unique NFT collectible that can grow its value over time as the community grows and the demand to join the members club as well.

Get $OTTR Tokens

Each NFT comes with a exclusive token package of 1.5 million $OTTR that will be airdropped on the luanch day.

Unlock Wealth

Each Otter Club NFT can unlock Ollie's Diary with hints to solve the mystery of the hidden whale wallet.

Club House Access

Each NFT holder can access the Otter Club House, a members only decentralized web application, to get access to exclusive audited early investment opportunities in the crypto world.

Pitch a Project

Each NFT owner can pitch a own project to get audited and to have the chance to launch it at the Otter Club House.

collaborations

Each Otter Club NFT will benefit from future collaborations with other crypto and NFT communities to expand the utilities of the Otter Club NFT.

the beginning of the otter dynasty

The Otter Club NFT

Get on the Whitelist

Mint your NFT

Creator
Weeping Pleb
Twitter Discord

Mint an otter club nft for only

0.02 ETH

WL Mint Price: 0.016 ETH

Public Mint Date: July 27, 2024 (Whitelist minting will at July 20, 2024)

Random Minting with the “first comes, first serve” principal. You are allowed to mint up to 10 NFTs. The minting profits will be used to build a Liquidity Pool for the upcoming $OTTR token in DEX and to develop the Otter Club House Application.

Join the Whitelist

Your ottlery VIP experience

plan your mint

You are allowed to mint up to 10 NFTs with your wallet. The amount of $OTTR tokens that you get are calculated based on the amount of NFTs that you own. Each NFT gives you the same privileges to join the giveaways and the Launchpad. You can sell your NFTs on the open market but make sure that you own at least one NFT to not lose your exclusive privileges. 

1 NFT

0.02 ETH

You will mint 1 Otter Club NFT to your Wallet and will get 1.5 Million $OTTR transferred to your wallet at the token launch day. 

3 NFTs

0.06 ETH

You will mint 3 Otter Club NFT to your Wallet and will get 4.5 Million $OTTR transferred to your wallet at the token launch day. 

10 NFTs

0.2 ETH

You will mint 10 Otter Club NFT to your Wallet and will get 15 Million $OTTR transferred to your wallet at the token launch day. 

Pe perpared

how to mint a Otter club nft?

If you are new to crypto you can follow the steps below that will help you to be prepared for the NFT mint.

Crypto Wallet

To be able to mint a Otter Club NFT and to receive $OTTR tokens we recommend using the MetaMask Wallet

Get a Wallet

Get ETH

Make sure to have at least 0.02 ETH (plus gas fees) in your wallet to be able to mint a Otter Club NFT

MINT NFT

At the mint day open the OpenSea minting link, connect your wallet and get your NFT. 

Join Whitelist

Get your $OTTR

At the day of the $OTTR token launch you will receive an amount of $OTTR tokens based on how many NFTs are in your wallet. 

The Otter club

How it works

Otter friends

NFT FAQ

When will the Minting / Sales Start?

We estimate the minting date between beginning and mid of may. Join our discord to get notified about updates on the minting date. 

How much will a Otter Club NFT cost?

There are no bonding curves at the Otter Club. Every NFT will cost 0.02 ETH + gas fees on public mint and 0.016 ETH for everyone who is on the whitelist.

How can I get a Otter Ciub NFT?

You can join the whitelist to have a guarantee to mint an NFT to mint the NFT you need to open the OpenSea link that we provide, connect your wallet to the OpenSea platform and then mint your NFTs. 

How will the profits be used?

80% of the profits will be used to fund the development of the ZONDORRA platform. 5% will given to support charity projects of the BIG FIVE Foundation. And 15% will be given to the BIG FIVE GROUP. 

How to Mint with MetaMask on a Phone?

If you are using a mobile phone to mint an Otter Club NFTS, you need to use the Metamask application built-in browser to mint our NFTs. Therefore, please launch the Metamask application, click the 3 lines on the top left menu in the application and select “Browser”. It will open a web browser and you will be able to navigate back to niftynafty.com to do the minting.

What blockchain is it on?

ERC-721 token on the Ethereum Blockchain. Files are hosted on IPFS.

Where can I get help if I'm new to NFTs?

If you join our Discord you can create a support ticket in the support channel. A NFT expert from our team will answer your question and provide you the material you need to get prepared. 

Are any NFTs withheld from the Sale?

Yes, 50 tokens will be held from the sale for the team, marketing and givaways.

Ho to Pay Less Gas Fees?

You can read more about here: https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015488771-How-to-adjust-Gas-Price-and-Gas-Limit

How can I avoid to get scammed?

There are many ways to prevent yourself from getting scammed, like: 1. Don’t click on any random links. 2. Don’t download any files dm’d to you. 3. Don’t share your secret recovery phrase with anyone (you only have to type it once on a new device, and never again unless YOU sign out). 4. Keep an eye on #report-scams for any new scams! Take your account security seriously, as there is no way for us to retrieve stolen items.

Stay updated on Ollie's Discord

Join on Discoord
